data.name: EverWorld
data.detailed_description:
EverWorld is a procedurally generated, action RPG adventure with deeply simulated artificial intelligence.
- Procedurally generated, infinite world
- Complex AI decisioning driven by goals, personality, opinions and context awareness
- AI driven content generation
- Procedurally generated items, magic, metals, crystals and quests
- NPCs that remember the player's behaviour
- Simulated civilisation and economy
data.about_the_game:
EverWorld is a procedurally generated, action RPG adventure with deeply simulated artificial intelligence.
- Procedurally generated, infinite world
- Complex AI decisioning driven by goals, personality, opinions and context awareness
- AI driven content generation
- Procedurally generated items, magic, metals, crystals and quests
- NPCs that remember the player's behaviour
- Simulated civilisation and economy
data.short_description: EverWorld is a procedurally generated, action RPG adventure with deeply simulated artificial intelligence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-750/AMD Phenom II X4-945
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 1GB /AMD HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB /AMD R9 290 4GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 11.2.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 8-core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 460 4GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 11.2.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz 8-Core Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M 8GB or external GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
